overview:
Federico Pascual is CEO at Gentela.com, a social media site for people in Latin America to discover and share content from anywhere on the web. GenteLA highlights the best stuff in the internet by the vote of its users. There aren’t any editors in GenteLA, the community collectively determine the value of content.

In the past, Federico was the co-founder of Outbox (former Wazoo Technologies) an uruguayan startup focused on internet applications.

Federico’s interests are among others: entrepreneurship, Web 2.0, strategic planning, viral & social media marketing, traveling, meeting new cultures and hanging out with friends.
